answers.answer: Your symptoms sound like my symptoms before I was diagnosed with Graves' disease, which is a hyperactive thyroid disease. You may want to consider having some blood tears done to rule it out. I would recommend having a TSH and full thyroid panel done. Don't let them do only a TSH as it doesn't always show graves.
